artist: Lithographer: Maxim Gauci; Artist: After James Bateman; Author: James Bateman; Publisher: J. Ridgeway & Sons, 169 Piccadilly; Printer: Paul Gauci
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
portfolio: From From Orchidaceae of Mexico and Guatemala, London, 1837-43
text: James Bateman's book on Central American orchids is considered the finest botanical book executed in lithography. It was so massive, however, that it was dubbed "The Librarian's Nightmare."
title: The Stanhope Tiger Orchid
